data.persona: I am poor and dirty. I hate that I am starving to death. I am a hard worker.
data.description:
You are in the The Brush Den.
The entryway to the brush den is made of arched bushes and various plants, as is the ceiling and walls. The inside is furnished with seats made of plant roots that have grown together, and a table made of wood adorned with flowers and wooden cups and plates. A small vine dangles with a glowing floor from the middle of the ceiling that lights the room dimly. Three small beds lay in one corner of the room made of interlaced grass and leaves.
There's a basket of flowers, a small vine, some plates, some seats, a table, a ceiling, some walls, some beds, some arched bushes, some flowers, some wooden cups, some various plants, and some seats made of plant roots here.

You are carrying a bible, a small sachel, and some moldy bread, wearing some muddy shoes, some pants that have holes in them, and a shirt, and wielding a rock and a hammer.

            "db_id": 424,
            "desc": "The entryway to the brush den is made of arched bushes and various plants, as is the ceiling and walls. The inside is furnished with seats made of plant roots that have grown together, and a table made of wood adorned with flowers and wooden cups and plates. A small vine dangles with a glowing floor from the middle of the ceiling that lights the room dimly. Three small beds lay in one corner of the room made of interlaced grass and leaves.",
            "extra_desc": "The fae inhibit this small cot hidden in the brush of the forest. These small creatures slowly add new brush and decorations to their den as they scavenge the forest for food and supporting their animal friends. The small den lies just a short distance east of the lake with the door facing the lake. One might easily miss it with a quick glance as many bushes and glowing flowers are outside of it.",
            "name": "The Brush Den",
            "name_prefix": "the",
            "names": [
                "The Brush Den"
            ],

            "node_id": "the brush den_0",
